item.description:
This is a great time to meet new Human Soles and Doggie Paws, I will post more information as time gets closer to this event but I thought I would post it so that the Soles can start thinking about it.



hi jamie, hope you don't mind that i'm posting :) melissa&iz (5/23/09)

• Paws Walk 2009 begins at 10 am and ends at 3 pm. Stratham Hill Park on Route 33, Stratham, NH


• Choose the 1.5 mile or 2 mile walk route.


• The event will take place rain or shine.


• Water and snacks are available for dogs along the walk route.


• All dogs must be leashed (No Flexi-Leads please), licensed and up to date on vaccinations. Females must not be in season.


• Participants may not bring any animal other than a dog to the
event, unless given prior approval by the NHSPCA.


• Children under the age of 12 must be accompanied by an adult.

MORE INFO AT:

http://www.nhspca.org...

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: New Hampshire SPCA Paws Walk 2009
